00048 
00049 NIVissimAbstractEdge::DictType NIVissimAbstractEdge::myDict;
00050 
00051 NIVissimAbstractEdge::NIVissimAbstractEdge(int id,
00052         const PositionVector& geom)
00053     : myID(id), myNode(-1) 
00054 {
00055     // convert/publicate geometry
00056     const PositionVector::ContType &geomC = geom.getCont();
00057     for (PositionVector::ContType::const_iterator i = geomC.begin(); i != geomC.end(); ++i) {
00058         Position p = *i;
00059         if (!NILoader::transformCoordinates(p)) {
00060             WRITE_WARNING("Unable to project coordinates for edge '" + toString(id) + "'.");
00061         }
00062         myGeom.push_back_noDoublePos(p);
00063     }
00064     //
00065     dictionary(id, this);
00066 }
00067 
00068 
00069 NIVissimAbstractEdge::~NIVissimAbstractEdge() {}
00070 
00071 
00072 bool
00073 NIVissimAbstractEdge::dictionary(int id, NIVissimAbstractEdge* e) {
00074     DictType::iterator i = myDict.find(id);
00075     if (i == myDict.end()) {
00076         myDict[id] = e;
00077         return true;
00078     }
00079     return false;
00080 }
00081 
00082 
00083 NIVissimAbstractEdge*
00084 NIVissimAbstractEdge::dictionary(int id) {
00085     DictType::iterator i = myDict.find(id);
00086     if (i == myDict.end()) {
00087         return 0;
00088     }
00089     return (*i).second;
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00093 
00094 Position
00095 NIVissimAbstractEdge::getGeomPosition(SUMOReal pos) const {
00096     if (myGeom.length() > pos) {
00097         return myGeom.positionAtLengthPosition(pos);
00098     } else if (myGeom.length() == pos) {
00099         return myGeom[-1];
00100     } else {
00101         PositionVector g(myGeom);
00102         SUMOReal amount = pos - myGeom.length();
00103         Position ne = GeomHelper::extrapolate_second(g[-2], g[-1], amount * 2);
00104         g.pop_back();
00105         g.push_back(ne);
00106         return g.positionAtLengthPosition(pos);
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00110 
00111 void
00112 NIVissimAbstractEdge::splitAndAssignToNodes() {
00113     for (DictType::iterator i = myDict.begin(); i != myDict.end(); i++) {
00114         NIVissimAbstractEdge* e = (*i).second;
00115         e->splitAssigning();
00116     }
00117 }
00118 
00119 void
00120 NIVissimAbstractEdge::splitAssigning() {}

00125 
00126 bool
00127 NIVissimAbstractEdge::crossesEdge(NIVissimAbstractEdge* c) const {
00128     return myGeom.intersects(c->myGeom);
00129 }
00130 
00131 
00132 Position
00133 NIVissimAbstractEdge::crossesEdgeAtPoint(NIVissimAbstractEdge* c) const {
00134     return myGeom.intersectsAtPoint(c->myGeom);
00135 }
00136 
00137 
00138 SUMOReal
00139 NIVissimAbstractEdge::crossesAtPoint(const Position& p1,
00140                                      const Position& p2) const {
00141     // !!! not needed
00142     Position p = GeomHelper::intersection_position(
00143                      myGeom.getBegin(), myGeom.getEnd(), p1, p2);
00144     return GeomHelper::nearest_position_on_line_to_point2D(
00145                myGeom.getBegin(), myGeom.getEnd(), p);
00146 }

00148 
00149 
00150 IntVector
00151 NIVissimAbstractEdge::getWithin(const AbstractPoly& p, SUMOReal offset) {
00152     IntVector ret;
00153     for (DictType::iterator i = myDict.begin(); i != myDict.end(); i++) {
00154         NIVissimAbstractEdge* e = (*i).second;
00155         if (e->overlapsWith(p, offset)) {
00156             ret.push_back(e->myID);
00157         }
00158     }
00159     return ret;
00160 }
00161 
00162 
00163 bool
00164 NIVissimAbstractEdge::overlapsWith(const AbstractPoly& p, SUMOReal offset) const {
00165     return myGeom.overlapsWith(p, offset);
00166 }
00167 
00168 
00169 bool
00170 NIVissimAbstractEdge::hasNodeCluster() const {
00171     return myNode != -1;
00172 }
00173 
00174 
00175 int
00176 NIVissimAbstractEdge::getID() const {
00177     return myID;
00178 }
00179 
00180 void
00181 NIVissimAbstractEdge::clearDict() {
00182     for (DictType::iterator i = myDict.begin(); i != myDict.end(); i++) {
00183         delete(*i).second;
00184     }
00185     myDict.clear();
00186 }

00189 const PositionVector&
00190 NIVissimAbstractEdge::getGeometry() const {
00191     return myGeom;
00192 }

00194 
00195 void
00196 NIVissimAbstractEdge::addDisturbance(int disturbance) {
00197     myDisturbances.push_back(disturbance);
00198 }
00199 
00200 
00201 const IntVector&
00202 NIVissimAbstractEdge::getDisturbances() const {
00203     return myDisturbances;
